Lagniappe.Name: The 415
Lagniappe.Description: Asian sisig fries topped with pork, green onion and cheese

Lagniappe.Name: Beaucoup Mac & Cheese
Lagniappe.Description: A delicate four cheese blend of white, sharp cheddar, colby jack and gouda cheese with large elbow macaroni in a silky milk blend

Vegetarian.Name: The Berkley
Vegetarian.Description: Mushrooms and spinach sautéed in a light spicy tomato sauce over corn grits

Carnivore.Name: Bayou Broth
Carnivore.Description: Short ribs, shrimp, mussels, hot sausage and kimchi in a spicy asian broth over japanese noodles

Carnivore.Name: City of Angels Chicken/Waffles
Carnivore.Description: Marinated and cajun fried chicken thigh with a light waffles served with our in house made bourbon syrup

Carnivore.Name: Mardi Gras Mambo
Carnivore.Description: Our take on jambalaya pasta. Penne noodles served with chicken, andouille, spicy sausage and gulf shrimp in a creamy light tomato sauce

Carnivore.Name: The 504
Carnivore.Description: Marinated cajun fried chicken thigh on a brioche bun, house made cole slaw, pickles. May add our hyphe sauce or mayo on top

Carnivore.Name: The Good Looks
Carnivore.Description: Candied chicken wins. Six jumbo korean style chicken wings coated in sweet and spicy sauce

Pescatarian.Name: Oaktown
Pescatarian.Description: Garlicky dungeness crab roasted in butter and server over asian style garlic noodles

Pescatarian.Name: The Uptown
Pescatarian.Description: Gulf shrimp, chicken andouille, shitake, king oyster and maitake mushrooms, sautéed spinach and jalepeno over corn grits. May add cheddar cheese for extra $1.00
